text: Clarke has written that on the evening of September 12 , President Bush told him and some of his staff to explore possible Iraqi links to 9/11 . " See if Saddam did this , " Clarke recalls the President telling them . " See if he 's linked in any way . " While he believed the details of Clarke 's account to be incorrect , President Bush acknowledged that he might well have spoken to Clarke at some point , asking him about Iraq .
